This interactive map provides a three-dimensional visualization of buildings in the Laajalahti bay area, the heights of which correspond to selected properties upon request. The datasets used were buildings in Helsinki (WFS: Rakennukset_alue_rekisteritiedot) and Espoo (WFS: Rakennukset) both dated November 16, 2023, a mapping of RA_KAYTTARK for buildings in Helsinki, sensible groupings of purposes of use in both building datasets, and place data sourced from the Overture Maps release dated October 19, 2023 (places theme, confidence > 0.6).
